item.title: footnotes 2.5.10 reverts 2.5.9d1 and apologies
item.description: In the development of the WordPress plugin footnotes, we shipped a broken version that crashed websites for arond four hours starting from 08:37 am. Here is the short version. If you want to dive deeper, check out this forum post Dear footnotes community thank you for your continued support. Iâ€™m sorry we shipped a broken version of the plugin earlier today and we reverted to a stable version with the latest update 2.
